Class AeHandler

All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.axis.Handler, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AeBpelHandler
public abstract class AeHandler
extends org.apache.axis.providers.BasicProvider

The base handler for web services under an Axis framework.

createBindingOperation

protected javax.wsdl.BindingOperation createBindingOperation(org.apache.axis.description.ServiceDesc aServiceDesc,
                                                             javax.wsdl.Definition aDef,
                                                             javax.wsdl.PortType aPortType,
                                                             javax.wsdl.Operation aOperation)
Creates a binding operation to be added to a binding.

Parameters:
aServiceDesc - the service description
aDef - the WSDL definition
aPortType - the portType for the operation
aOperation - the operation we are creating the binding operation for.

createBodyElement

protected org.w3c.dom.Element createBodyElement(org.apache.axis.description.ServiceDesc aServiceDesc,
                                                javax.wsdl.Definition aDef,
                                                org.w3c.dom.Document aDoc,
                                                javax.wsdl.PortType aPortType,
                                                boolean aIsRPCStyle)
Creates a SOAP body to be added as an extensibility element of our WSDL.

Parameters:
aServiceDesc - the service descriptor
aDoc - the DOM used for creating the element
aDef - the wsdl def
aPortType - provides the namespace for the body element in the event that we're producing RPC Literal bindings
aIsRPCStyle - flag indicating if this is RPC style as opposed to document style binding

createSoapExtElement

protected javax.wsdl.extensions.ExtensibilityElement createSoapExtElement(java.lang.String aName,
                                                                          org.w3c.dom.Element aElement)
Helper method to create a SOAP extensibility element given the extensibility name and DOM Element which is the basis for the extensibility element.

Parameters:
aName - the name of the extensibility element
aElement - the basis for the extensibility element

getDocument

protected org.w3c.dom.Document getDocument()
Returns a document object used to create elements used for extensibility elements.

mapInputData

protected void mapInputData(org.apache.axis.description.ServiceDesc aServiceDesc,
                            IAeMessageData aInputMsg,
                            java.util.HashMap aDataMap)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
Maps the message data contained in the data map to the given input message. The data map specifies a Part to SOAPBodyElement relationship, in which the SOAPBodyElement contains the actual data which needs to be mapped.

Parameters:
aServiceDesc - the service description for the service provider
aInputMsg - the input message to be populated with data
aDataMap - map to store part to element mappings
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
